_header: There been three points of mischief
Note: Cf. 2551 where incorporated with six preceding stanzas of personal introduction.
_description: A Series of Triads — 100 lines in eight-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain

BodTan407.First Lines:
Ther ben iij poyntis of myscheffþat arn confusion to many
                    man…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…Here to haue so good an endeþat we be not cause of oure
                    owyn wo
BodTan407.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 269-72.
Louis,  Cameron,

                407.
